Title: Establishes the child poverty reduction advisory council to effectuate a reduction of child poverty in the state
Summary: Establishes the child poverty reduction advisory council to effectuate a fifty percent reduction of child poverty in the state within ten years and requires the director of the budget to evaluate the effects reductions to the state budget will have on reducing child poverty in New York state.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to evaluating the effects adjustments or reductions to the state budget will have on reducing child poverty in New York state; to establish the child poverty reduction advisory council to effectuate a reduction in child poverty in the state; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
